author: Anonymous Gear
title: constantly receiving variable not defined messages
question:
Hello,
Can anyone tell me why the 3^2 is undefined in this code
(sqrt (+ 3^2 4^2))
student_answer: I think you should probably use (sqr) instead of ^
instructor_answer: Firstly, the operation ^ is not defined in BSL – you’ll have to look up the function expt in the drracket help desk, or, in this case, use sqr like the student answer suggested. Secondly, the placement of the ^ isn’t quite correct - This is like saying (* 3+4 7+8), which doesn’t follow the correct syntax.
